pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, April 5, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
All times local.

Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, April 5, 2018:

Québec City, Quebec

8 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Business 7 Summit.

Château Frontenac    
1 Rue des Carrières

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 7:15 a.m. at the lobby of the Château Frontenac for accreditation
  • Open coverage for remarks

Victoria, British Columbia

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Canadian Coast Guard workers to discuss marine safety and spill prevention.

Canadian Coast Guard
25 Huron Street

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 2:00 p.m. at the main gate for accreditation
  • Photo opportunity only on the ship

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Canadian Coast Guard
25 Huron Street

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

Vancouver, British Columbia

5:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a clean tech roundtable.

Fairmont Pacific Rim Hotel
1038 Canadian Place

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 5:15 p.m. in the lobby of the Fairmont Pacific Rim Hotel for accreditation
  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the roundtable
